ValidationRule.description: Est Concessions Offered ($) is required when stage is launch, propose, Closed Won, Closed Lost and closed canceled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Closed Lost'), ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Closed Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Launch'), ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Propose') ), ISBLANK(Est_Concessions_Offered_Dollar__c), OR( Record_Type_Name__c='AM_Standard', Record_Type_Name__c='AM_Catalog', Record_Type_Name__c='AM_Complex', Record_Type_Name__c='OE Complex', Record_Type_Name__c='OE Standard' ) )
